activate.title: Activate meal plan?
activate.content: Are you sure you want to activate this meal plan?
activate-overwrite.title: Switch meal plan?
activate-overwrite.content:
If you proceed, your current active meal plan will be deactivated.
Are you sure?
restart.title: Restart meal plan?
restart.content:
If you proceed, your meal plan will be re-generated with your current settings.
Are you sure?
working.title: We're working on it!
working.content: We're finding recipes that will help you reach your goals
